Interface RequestHelper

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultRequestHelper
public interface RequestHelper
A RequestHelper object is used to read parameters from the request. Main features are handling of numeric parameters and the ability to create Href objects from the current request.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Href
    getHref()
    return the current Href for the request (base url and parameters).
    Integer
    getIntParameter(String key)
    Reads an Integer parameter from the request.
    String
    getParameter(String key)
    Reads a String parameter from the request.
    Map<String,String[]>
    getParameterMap()
    Returns a Map containing all the parameters in the request.

  • Method Details

    • getHref

      Href getHref()
      return the current Href for the request (base url and parameters).
      Returns:
      Href

    • getParameter

      String getParameter(String key)
      Reads a String parameter from the request.
      Parameters:
      key - String parameter name
      Returns:
      String parameter value

    • getIntParameter

      Integer getIntParameter(String key)
      Reads an Integer parameter from the request.
      Parameters:
      key - String parameter name
      Returns:
      Integer parameter value or null if the parameter is not found or it can't be transformed to an Integer

    • getParameterMap

      Map<String,String[]> getParameterMap()
      Returns a Map containing all the parameters in the request.
      Returns:
      Map
